mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rnum, M.* FROM( select key, title, image, avg(starrating) as starrating FROM moviestarrating GROUP BY key, title, image ORDER BY starrating DESC ) M ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN 1 AND 3
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rnum, M.* FROM( select isbn, avg(starrating) as starrating FROM bookstarrating GROUP BY isbn ORDER BY starrating DESC ) M ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN 1 AND 3
